import React, { useState } from "react"; import './MobileHeader.css'; import logo from '../../imgs/logo.png'; import user from '../../imgs/user.png'; import { FaSearch } from 'react-icons/fa'; export default function MobileHeader() { const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = useState(false); function toggleMenu(e) { if (menuOpen !== true) { e.target.classList.add('open') setMenuOpen(true) } else { e.target.classList.remove('open') setMenuOpen(false) } } return (
